sentences.en: A power failure during the firmware writing operation will disable the camera.
sentences.cn: 固件写入过程中切勿关闭电源.

sentences.en: A signal used enable or disable a circuit function.
sentences.cn: 或禁止电路功能的信号.

sentences.en: Auto disable screen saver ( setting condition of disable screen saver )
sentences.cn: 自动禁止屏幕保护- ( 设置禁用屏幕保护的条件 )

sentences.en: Carter was permanently disabled in the war.
sentences.cn: 卡特在那场战争中成了终生残废。

sentences.en: Clear the check boxes for settings you want to disable.
sentences.cn: 清除要禁用的设置的复选框.

sentences.en: Disable BIOS memory options such as caching or shadowing.
sentences.cn: 禁用BIOS中内存设置,诸如缓存和映射.

sentences.en: Disable buffering ( reduce delays in stream delivery, recommended for synchronized events )
sentences.cn: 禁用缓冲 ( 减少流传递中的延迟,对于同步事件, 建议使用此功能 )

sentences.en: Disable Image Toolbar for all future browsing sessions or this session only?
sentences.cn: 为所有将来的浏览会话禁用图片工具栏还是只针对此会话?

sentences.en: Disable menu items when they are not applicable.
Fitting prostheses and or thoses for the disable, including intelligent prostheses.
sentences.cn: 为各类上、肢截肢及其它肌残病人安装各类假肢及矫形器, 包括目前最先进的智能假肢.

sentences.en: If problems comtinue, disable or any newly installed hardware or software.
sentences.cn: 如果问题还存在, 禁用或删除新安装的硬件或软件.

sentences.en: If you disable the switch, the trace messages will not appear.
sentences.cn: 如果禁用此开关, 则不会显示跟踪消息.

sentences.en: It's an injury that could disable somebody for life.
sentences.cn: 这种伤害可能会造成终身残疾.

sentences.en: Job applications from disable workers poured in at a staggering rate.
sentences.cn: 残废工人求职申请书大批涌来、数量惊人.

sentences.en: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her.
sentences.cn: 她肌腱受了这么多损伤，这真地使她致残了。

sentences.en: To disable the auto - detection of encoding, clear this option.
sentences.cn: 若要禁用自动编码检测, 请清除此选项.

sentences.en: What command will disable CDP on a router interface?
sentences.cn: 那个指令可以在路由器接口上关闭CDP协议?

words.tran_cn: 使…失去能力（disable的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 使伤残，使无效，使不能运转
trans.tran_en: to make someone unable to use a part of their body properly
If an injury or illness disables someone, it affects them so badly that it restricts the way that they can live their life
